definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine

sentences.english: Shake and strain into a rocks glass, add 7up, stir.
sentences.chinese: 加冰搖合原料濾入冰過的玻璃杯，注入七喜，攪合。

sentences.english: Add all ingredients into an ice filled shaker.
sentences.chinese: 加入所有材料到加冰的調酒壺。

sentences.english: Shake with ice and strain over ice. Serve with a straw.
sentences.chinese: 加冰搖合原料，濾入冰塊，置入吸管。

sentences.english: Shake recipe with ice, strain over ice and top with Champagne.
sentences.chinese: 加冰搖合原料，濾入冰塊，注入適量香檳。

sentences.english: Shake with ice and strain over ice. Serve with a straw and swizzle-stick.
sentences.chinese: 加冰搖合原料，濾入冰塊，置入吸管。

sentences.english: Stir first three ingredients with ice and strain into glass, then top up with Champagne and lightly stir.
sentences.chinese: 前三項加冰攪合，濾入杯子，倒適量香檳後輕輕攪拌。

sentences.english: Shake recipe with ice , strain over fresh ice and top with soda water.
sentences.chinese: 加冰搖合所有原料，濾入冰塊，注入適量蘇打水。

sentences.english: Build over ice, garnish with a melon slice, few melon balls and a red cherry.
sentences.chinese: 加冰添加原料，飾以蜜瓜片，少量蜜瓜球和紅櫻桃。

sentences.english: Yes, I'd like a glass of ginger ale.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我要一杯加冰冰塊的姜味汽水。

sentences.english: Add one table-spoon of grated coco-nut and shake with ice and strain.
sentences.chinese: 加半勺椰子堅果，加冰搖合，濾入玻璃杯。

sentences.english: Add juice to tall glass of ice. Fill with cola, stir add long twist of lime.
sentences.chinese: 檸檬汁入加冰高杯，入可樂，直調後飾萊姆長條。

sentences.english: He asked for ice for his whiskey and proceeded to get drunk.
sentences.chinese: 他要求給他的威士忌裏面加冰，接着喝得大醉。

sentences.english: Stri recipe with ice and a drop of orange bitters, then strain into chilled glass.
sentences.chinese: 加冰攪合配方，滴入少量橘子苦酒，濾入冰過的杯子。

sentences.english: Would you like it straight up or on the rocks, sir?
sentences.chinese: 先生，您是需要加冰還是純飲？
威士忌是加冰還是直飲？

definition: Baileys Irish Cream (brand of alcoholic drink)/see also 百利甜酒[Bai3 li4 Tian2 jiu3]
